name: Singleplayer FPS
description:
This is a Single Player FPS. 

Main Features:
  • Advanced AI
  • Dynamic AI Difficulty
  • Kill Streaks
  • Story

Note: Although I hope these features will be added eventually I can't promise anything. Due to school progress may be slow.

Gameplay:

The gameplay is fast pace but the time to kill is somewhat slow (~1500ms). The reason for this is that I think most frustration from games like Call of Duty is the fast ttk as the player doesn't have enough time to react in some scenarios which may feel unfair. As for guns I can't promise much that is why I've decided not give them their own point but I'll try to make the guns as unique as possible instead of feeling repetitive, with different stats, models and animations. 

Advanced AI: 

Because most FPS focus on multiplayer the AI is bound to be poor and feel either very bad or artificial. My goal is to make the AI as human as possible, I want the player feel like their playing with actual people. However with that comes the element of frustration if the enemy team is dominating you which brings us to the second feature.

Dynamic AI Difficulty:

The main goal is to combine the advanced AI with a dynamic enemy difficulty. Not only do I want the difficulty to change at the start of the match but I want the difficulty change in real time.

Kill Streaks:

I think the concept of killstreaks is interesting. But the problem with them is that they may feel unfair and unbalanced even if they're not. However with the dynamic AI this SHOULD balance out.

Story:

Now here I can't guaranty much due to my lack of time and constantly feeling burned out from school and social interactions (Social Anxiety). However the story I envision is about two human factions in the future fighting a conflict in a Simulation the hosts of the mentioned simulation is an alien race. The whole plot is around the simulation itself. I also wanted the story to branch out so the player would  be able to choose the path they want with their actions, but I don't know how that will work out.

Controls:
  • Keyboard:
    • Move (W, A, S, D)
    • Jump (Space)
    • Reload (R)
    • Slow-motion (F1)
  • Mouse
    • Shoot (LMB)
    • Look (Mouse Movement)
